(This isn't a response to shots fire at Vehement, I plan on doing that in my 
usual ginormous post)

Vehement/Reflector:



Vehement looked to Reflector, firing off a sonic wave to intercept shots 
heading for the smallest member of the Brotherhood.

"I have a holy quest for you, small one.  Go to this location," a mental 
projection of the area entering Reflector's mind.  "There is a newly online 
robot there.  Retrieve him at all costs."

"But the battle..."

"Your concerns are faulty.  We will hold.  It is the will of our 
Chaos-Bringer."

"Yes, Archbishop." Reflector said.  He headed northwest at full speed towards 
Brazil.  It wouldn't take that long.
